alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:32PM CDT until August 10 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ransom County in southeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Richland County in southeastern North Dakota... Northeastern Sargent County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 532 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gwinner to near Milnor to near Rutland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hankinson, Gwinner, Milnor, Lidgerwood, Forman, Wyndmere and Mantador. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
